Vessel: GANTA BHUM – Voy: 020E

Port of Loading: KATTUPALLI (India)

Port of Discharge: LAEM ChABANG (Thailand)

ETD KAT: 02 May 2023

ETA LCH: 16 May 2023

Stuffing Place: Triway CFS (Chennai)

Document cut off date: 26 April 2023

Stuffing cut off date: 27 April 2023

The fastest and cheapest, weekly LCL direct service: Chennai, India to Laem Chabang, Thailand 

Book your LCL direct service now!

Contact Nataraj Ganapathy on (+91) 98401 18740 today!

At FLS Logistics, we offer direct weekly departure to ensure reliable transit time with the most competitive cost. 

The fastest and cheapest solution to consolidate your LCL

  • Directly connecting Chennai (India) and Laem Chabang (Thailand)
  • Optimised transit time: 14 days PTP
  • Avoiding all border crossings, cargo inspections, and misroutings.
  • FLS’ own consolidation box
  • Weekly departure every Monday, CFS closing on Thursday
  • World-class experts in support
